original_title: Mais où sont les nègres d'antan ?
overview: "A Parisian ethnographer travels to a small village in the depths of Africa where he records primitive sounds and music. Back in Paris, his recordings become fashionable and make him famous. He thus earns a lot of money. money and behave like a nouveau riche. One day, the village sorcerer comes to Paris and demands his share of the profits."
title: Mais où sont les nègres d'antan ?
